DOC.brief_summary: Volunteers divide randomly five experimental group . VAS ( Visual Analogic scale ) measure DOMS ( Delayed Onset Muscle Soreness ) blood sample take procedure . Then , volunteer perform stretch warm-up follow MVC test ( isometric test isokinetic dynamometer measure muscle function ) . After , volunteer perform exercise protocol ( 75 eccentric contraction ) lead muscle fatigue . Immediately exercise protocol ( 1 minute ) 1 hour , 24 , 48 , 72 96 hour , blood sample , VAS measure MVC test repeat . The treatment accord randomisation perform three minute exercise protocol perform 24 , 48 , 72h eccentric exercise . The variable regard muscle function ( MVC , DOMS ) indirect marker muscle damage ( CK activity ) monitor time point mention ( baseline , 1 minute , 1 hour , 24 , 48 , 72 96 hour exercise protocol ) .
DOC.brief_title: Phototherapy Cryotherapy Post-exercise Skeletal Muscle Recovery
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled clinical trial perform Laboratory Phototherapy Sport Exercise Nove de Julho University city São Paulo , Brazil . Fifty healthy untrained male subject recruit university staff student participate study . All participant voluntarily must agree participate sign informed consent statement . The intention-to-treat analysis follow . The volunteer randomly allocate five experimental group ( n=10 per group ) accord apply comparator . Randomisation carry simple draw lot ( A , B , C , D E ) . Blood sample ( 10 ml ) take qualified nurse analyse CK activity posteriorly . This blood collection repeat 1 minute , 1 hour , 24 , 48 , 72 96 hour eccentric protocol . A visual analogue scale ( VAS ) 100 mm use self-rating volunteer DOMS intensity , assistance blind researcher . DOMS assessment perform baseline , immediately eccentric exercise protocol ( 1 minute ) , repeat 1 , 24 , 48 , 72 96 hour exercise protocol . Before exercise protocol , volunteer perform stretch warm-up non-dominant low limb perform Maximum voluntary contraction ( MVC ) evaluate muscle function . MVC measurement repeat time interval CK measure . The exercise protocol consist 75 eccentric isokinetic contraction knee extensor musculature non-dominant leg ( 5 set 15 repetition , 30-second rest interval set ) velocity 60°.seg-1 eccentric concentric movement 60° range motion ( 90° 30° knee flexion ) . Regarding treatment , volunteer receive treatment accord randomisation three minute eccentric exercise protocol . Comparators repeat 24 , 48 , 72 hour follow collection additional blood sample CK analyse MVC DOMS assessment . The five group divide : PBMT ( photobiomodulation therapy ) +cryotherapy ; cryotherapy+PBMT ; active PBMT ; placebo PBMT cryotherapy . PBMT apply employ cordless , portable GameDay™ Super Pulsed Laser ( manufacture Multi Radiance Medical , USA ) 6 site quadriceps femoris direct contact skin ( 2 centrally - rectus femoral vastus intermedius ; 2 laterally - vastus lateralis ; 2 medially - vastus medialis ) cryotherapy do two flexible ice pack fill ice cube water ( volume 1.15 liter ) cover entire quadriceps 20 minute .
DOC.criteria: Subjects include study perform less 2 exercise session per week Subjects exclude occurred musculoskeletal injury hip knee within previous two month , currently use pharmacological agent nutritional supplement regularly , musculoskeletal injury study occur report use either alcohol tobacco .
